item.description:
let's meetup at atwoods in cambridge at 6pm on saturday, 23 may, to hear les sampou play from 6-9 p.m

a few of us saw les sampou at her 7 february show at atwoods as well as her 25 march show at toad and she was just terrific.

here's a link to the atwoods tavern website. (click the 'Parking & Directions' tab at the top of the page for driving and T information.)

visit her website for more information on les.

i'll update this with more details later in the week; e.g., with possible dining plans.

update:

please see this message board page for information on dinner plans.
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to everyone who RSVPs 'Yes' or 'Maybe' by 23 may, 3 p.m.
item.name: les sampou @ atwoods tavern
